{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
import fastcore
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
from fastai2.basics import *
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
@patch
def __new__(cls:Transform, *args, **kwargs):
    res = super(Transform, cls).__new__(cls)
    res.listeners = L()
    return res
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
@patch
def __call__(self:Transform, x, **kwargs):
    res = self._call('encodes', x, **kwargs)
    self.broadcast(res)
    return res
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
@patch
def broadcast(self:Transform, x):
    for l in self.listeners: l(x)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
# Make sure we dont subscribe twice
@patch
def subscribe(self:Transform, f):
    self.listeners.append(f)
    return f
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
@Transform
def neg(x): return -x
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
from fastai2.text.all import *
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
inp = 'The tears of the dragon'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
tfm  = Categorize(vocab=[0,1,2])
tfm.order = 0
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def subscribe(tfm):
    def labeller(f):
        def _inner(x):
            x.label = getattr(x,'label',[])
            x.label.append(f(x))
        tfm.subscribe(_inner)
    return labeller
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
@subscribe(tfm)
def listening(x):
    return 1
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
@subscribe(neg)
def listening2(x):
    return 2
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
pipe = Pipeline([tfm, neg])
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
res = pipe(0)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
res.label

[1, 2]
{% endraw %}
